segments.text: How do you celebrate Thanksgiving in the US ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Thanksgiving is family event.So on Thanksgiving , family members will get together and enjoy a big Thanksgiving dinner . Kids will have lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you say prayers before dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . It is an exciting moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the biggest fun for you on Thanksgiving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For me ? The football games of course , I love football games .
segments.speaker: S2
